QuestData.Title: Keep It Secret
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari here are a threat to our campaign, $c.$b$bTheir use of magic is an abomination. They mix the power of arcane with the darkness of shadow with little care to consequence.$b$bWe cannot afford for them to find their full strength here or for the Horde to learn of their twisted magic.$b$bTheir numbers must be thinned. I will leave this task to you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 8 Zandalari trolls within Conqueror's Terrace.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $c. The more Zandalari we destroy, the less chance their magic will fall into Horde hands.
